ranks.text: After 4/18, visit the Clinic near LeBlanc Cafe and talk to her to start this cooperation.Unlocks Rejuvenation, increasing the range of healing items the clinic stocks.
Requires rank 2 (bold) guts.Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks Sterilization, adding even more items to the clinic shop.
choices: Choice 3: "I don't mind." +2 / "I need the medicine." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
choices: Choice 2: "You seem happy." +3 / "You're so kind." +2 / "Why free?" +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks Immunization, adding support items to the clinic shop.
choices: Choice 3: "That's good." +3 / "When will it be done?" +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks a Discount, reducing the cost of clinic items significantly.
choices: Choice 1: "This is harrassment." +2 / "She's a great doctor." +2
Choice 3: "Just rest for today." +2 / "Anything I can do?" +2
Choice 4: "We all do sometimes." +3 / "I'm glad you did." +2

ranks.text: Requires rank 4 (charismatic) charm.Impactful conversation choices for this rank:After this a sidequest / request for Mementos is unlocked: Bad Medicine.Complete the Bad Medicine sidequest, then return to Tae:
choices: Choice 2: "Let's get to work, doctor." +3 / "It's not over yet." +3 / "You should hurry." +2
Choice 3: "It's for you." +3 / "It's for Miwa-chan." +3 / "It's for my exams." +2

ranks.text: This is the point when a romance with Tae Takemi becomes available.Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Romance - "I wanted to see you"Friendship - "It was for my exams."Romance - "I love you."Friendship - "What do you think?"Romance - "It isn't a joke."Friendship - "That sounds good."
choices: Choice 1: "It was rough." +3 / "Don't worry about it." +2 / "It was for my exams." +2

ranks.text: Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank.Unlocks Resuscitation, adding more revival-related items to the clinic store.
